data.actual_result: The effect isn't applies unless you scroll over the message with the url or switch to another channel and back
data.expected_result: The effect of the embed preference applies correctly when changed
data.short_description: Disabling/Enabling either of the embed preferences in Text & Images don't apply the effects correctly while viewing a channel with links that would be effected
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel that has links to images or website previews posted in - Go into your User Settings -> Text & Images and enable or disable the embed preferences (easiest just to do both) - Exit out of your User Settings and observe that the embeds are still visible/gone
